# Search Field Disable AutoFormat Attributes

### Description

This example demonstrates [Search Field](/components/cerner-terra-core-docs/search-field/about) with disabled autoformat attributes. This example uses the 'inputAttributes' prop with various auto-formatting feature attributes.
